examples.example: 我相信只要努力，未来一定充满无限可能。

translate.english: I believe that as long as we work hard, the future will definitely be full of unlimited possibilities.

examples.example: 只要我们坚持不懈地追求梦想，就一定会取得成功。

translate.english: As long as we persevere in pursuing our dreams, we will surely succeed.

examples.example: 我相信只要坚持锻炼，身体一定会越来越健康。

translate.english: I believe that as long as we keep exercising, the body will definitely become healthier and healthier.
